What can I do for you?
Well I'm calling to book a table for four people,...
...and also I'd like to ask you a few questions.
Certainly, sir. What do you need to know?
Well, what are your opening hours?
Our restaurant is open from Tuesday to Sunday.
And is there a car park?
Yes, the car park is at the back of the restaurant.
Great, and what time do you serve lunch?
Well, then I'd like to make a reservation then.
For lunch. We'll be coming around 1 o'clock.
Yeah. M O N A G H A N.
Alright Mr. Monaghan, one table for four for Sunday, 1:00 p.m.
